original_text:
For the chastisement of the daughter of my people has been greater
    than the punishment of Sodom,
which was overthrown in a moment,
    and no hands were wrung for her.
korean_text: 전에 소돔이 사람의 손을 대지 아니하였는데도 순식간에 무너지더니 이제는 딸 내 백성의 죄가 소돔의 죄악보다 무겁도다

sentences.original_text: For the chastisement of the daughter of my people
has been greater than the punishment of Sodom
which was overthrown in a moment
and no hands were wrung for her
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그를 위해 가슴을 치지 않았다
